desc: Design Build Custom Visual Merchandising Solutions for Tabletop Strategy Board Game, Card Game, Roleplaying Game, Wargame, puzzles, models - our goal is to make it easier for customers to find the products they're browsing for in your store, and for you to be able to stock more products in the same space in your store

layout.text: Custom designed & built retail display fixtures for the hobby games industry, with an emphasis on maximizing product density, without sacrificing product visibility.
